column4: Ups :-( Who can answer me on stupid question? How I can disconnect from internet? :-) I don't see any disconnect button on my Desktop :-(

Hello. I can't find in my ubuntu 6.06 my favourite Midnight Commander. And I can't find it in Synaptic. What should I do? Or I should install konsole? Maybe there is other good file manager I may install from synaptic?
MC is in the repos I think, you could also try Krusader
